channel.title: Activating a new cell phone
channel.description: When you activate a cell phone, they charge you for te first moth during the activation process right?

item.title: Activating a new cell phone
item.dc:creator: @o_town_reaper o_town_reaper
item.description:
@o_town_reaper wrote:

When I had a prepaid phone it only charged me for when I used the phone.

Read full topic

item.title: Activating a new cell phone
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“Chimaera God, post:7, topic:211344”][quote author=Tico135 link=topic=278399.msg2269534#msg2269534 date=1213167139]

When you activate a cell phone, they charge you for te first moth during the activation process right?

Yeah, most cell phone service providers do charge you an activation fee per month, and also at the start when the cell phone is activated for the first time. It’ll probably end up being anywhere from $5-15 depending on the service provider, and about $5-10 per month.
[/quote]

No, I meant if they charge you the monthly cost (like mine is 56 USD a month). I know about the activation fee, I was just wondering if they charge you the first monthly bill when you activatethe phone.[/quote]

Yeah, they do. It’s just not as much as when you first activate the phone.

Or have I mis-understood what you said?

Read full topic

item.title: Activating a new cell phone

When you activate a cell phone, they charge you for te first moth during the activation process right?

Yeah, most cell phone service providers do charge you an activation fee per month, and also at the start when the cell phone is activated for the first time. It’ll probably end up being anywhere from $5-15 depending on the service provider, and about $5-10 per month.
[/quote]

No, I meant if they charge you the monthly cost (like mine is 56 USD a month). I know about the activation fee, I was just wondering if they charge you the first monthly bill when you activatethe phone.[/quote]
should be after a month is in UK

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Tico135, post:6, topic:211344”][quote author=Chimaera God link=topic=278399.msg2267548#msg2267548 date=1213069502]
When you activate a cell phone, they charge you for te first moth during the activation process right?
[/quote]

Yeah, most cell phone service providers do charge you an activation fee per month, and also at the start when the cell phone is activated for the first time. It’ll probably end up being anywhere from $5-15 depending on the service provider, and about $5-10 per month.[/quote]

No, I meant if they charge you the monthly cost (like mine is 56 USD a month). I know about the activation fee, I was just wondering if they charge you the first monthly bill when you activatethe phone.

Read full topic

item.title: Activating a new cell phone
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Chimaera God:

When you activate a cell phone, they charge you for te first moth during the activation process right?

Yeah, most cell phone service providers do charge you an activation fee per month, and also at the start when the cell phone is activated for the first time. It’ll probably end up being anywhere from $5-15 depending on the service provider, and about $5-10 per month.

Read full topic
